title: Chapter 4546 - Chapter 4546: 4545 Exterminating Evil Sequence Camp 11
body:
Chapter 4546 - Chapter 4546: 4545 Exterminating Evil Sequence Camp 11

Chapter 4546: 4545 exterminating evil sequence camp 11

“He wants to break this space. We Can’t let him succeed!”

“Take his attack head-on and tie him down!”

When the Lord of Calamity and the rest saw Wang Xian heading towards the space behind them, they revealed a cold expression.

Facing the Chaos Spear, they formed a defense in front of them to defend themselves.

“Boom!”

“Boom Boom Boom!”

A terrifying power landed on their bodies, and the destructive energy on the spear pierced through their defenses.

However, the Lord of calamity and Axe Sword Demon weren’t afraid at all!

“Pu Pu!”

“Pu Pu!”

A powerful force pierced through their bodies, and the chaos energy corroded them.

Their expressions changed drastically, and they were heavily injured.

However, a wound appeared on the bodies of a group of Heaven’s origin creation powerhouses from the evil sequence faction behind them.

The effect of the lifeline of life was displayed once again.

Their wounds were healing at a terrifying speed.

“Attack!”

“Attack!”

Axe sword demon and the Lord of disaster roared furiously and attacked Wang Xian once again.

“Huh?”

Wang Xian sensed the situation behind him and frowned slightly.

Before he could launch an attack on this space, the attacks of the Lord of Calamity and the others had already arrived.

Taking his attacks head-on?

Wang Xian’s eyes flickered. He could only turn around and receive the attacks of the Lord of Calamity and the others.

The attacks of the Lord of calamity were inclined towards the darkness attribute.

The attacks of the axe sword demon were of the Lightning attribute.

As for the thousand tentacles, it was of the water attribute.

Buzz! Buzz

Faced with the Lord of disaster and the axe sword demon who were exchanging injuries for injuries, Wang Xian immediately dodged.

The opponent’s attack power and recovery ability were very strong.

If Wang Xian were to take it head-on, although he had a time domain and his recovery ability was a hundred times stronger than before, there was no need for him to take it head-on.

Speed was still his greatest advantage.

Boom! Boom! Boom

Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh

The Lord of Calamity, axe sword demon, and the rest wanted to attack in close combat. They wanted to exchange injuries for injuries while Wang Xian was dodging.

However, this space was very small. It was impossible for him to dodge all the attacks.

Gradually, Wang Xian was suppressed by their fighting style.

“Maintaining this special space consumes a lot of energy. However, with the life force of the Lord of Calamity and the rest, it shouldn’t be a problem for them to maintain it for tens of millions of years.”

“I can exchange my injuries for injuries and get rid of the thousand tentacles first. However, there’s no need for that now. I have to wait for all their trump cards to be unleashed. Otherwise, the losses might outweigh the gains.”

Wang Xian kept calculating in his heart.

It was still very difficult to completely destroy the other party.

Although he was currently trapped in this space, Wang Xian still had the confidence to suppress the Lord of Calamity and the others.

He could still exchange injuries with the other party.

However, he had to wait!

After the other party’s trump cards were unleashed one by one.

After the Lord of Calamity had reached the limit of this space.

Although it would waste tens of millions of years of time, this was the safest plan.

Hence, in the following period of time, the Lord of Calamity and axe sword demon continued to pursue Wang Xian, wanting to exchange injuries for injuries.

They wanted to engage in close combat.

At the rear, thousand tentacles was providing support and attacking continuously.

Wang Xian was in this space, constantly dodging.

He was constantly probing.

He was probing their trump cards.

He was probing their moves.

He was constantly using his divination power to perform divination.

After millions of years, their great battle was still erupting.

Some injuries had appeared on Wang Xian’s body.

These injuries were intentional.

Although the life force of the Lord of Calamity and the rest was extremely terrifying,.

Wang Xian’s recovery ability was even more terrifying than theirs.

The Lord of Calamity and the rest could share the damage.

It was extremely difficult to kill them.

However, Wang Xian’s recovery ability could be increased by a hundred times in the time domain.

For over a million years, they fought and fought.

The Lord of Calamity and the rest had also revealed almost all their trump cards and all their innate skills.

“It’s about time. My strength is stronger than I imagined. Furthermore, I have figured out everything about the other party. There’s no need to waste time.”

Wang Xian kept dodging the attacks of the Lord of disaster and the others. His eyes shone brightly.

He now had a clear understanding of his own strength.

With the enhancement of the time domain, his destructive power was only equivalent to five chaos levels.

However, with the enhancement of the time domain, his speed of recovery was a hundred times faster. This allowed him to fight against eight chaos level existences.

As for the Lord of Calamity and the others, their combined strength was only equivalent to six of them!

The most important point was that the power of chaos could be converted into any kind of power.

Especially the power of divination. In these millions of years, Wang Xian had a clear understanding of the other party.

He was stronger than he had imagined.

“There’s no need to wait for tens of millions of years. Their time of death is Here!”

Wang Xian’s eyes were filled with killing intent!

“Dragon King of the Dragon Palace, do you only know how to Dodge?”

Thousand Tentacles, the Lord of Calamity, and the rest roared with killing intent when they saw Wang Xian continuously dodging.

At this moment, they were filled with a strong desire to fight. They stared at Wang Xian, who was covered in blood stains.

They were now filled with confidence.

They believed that the Dragon King could be killed!

“Hehe!”

When Wang Xian heard their words, he laughed mockingly in a soft voice.

If he wanted to escape, would this space be able to stop him?

Although this space was very strong and formed its own domain.

However, as long as Wang Xian had a thought, he would be able to arrive at the demonic spirit altar.

However, there was no demonic spirit altar nearby.

“You have invaded our evil sequence camp. This time, we will make you pay a terrible price!”

Thousand tentacles roared loudly as countless tentacles emitted light.

Carrying an invincible might, they swept towards Wang Xian!

The Lord of Calamity and the rest moved their bodies. The black fog condensed into countless claws, wanting to trap Wang Xian!

Axe sword demon waved his huge sword and slashed out a terrifying figure. Similarly, he attacked Wang Xian!

Wang Xian saw this scene and smiled sinisterly.

With a wave of his arm, he welcomed the countless tentacles of the thousand tentacles directly!

The moment he came into contact with the tentacles.

Wang Xian’s arm also transformed into tentacles that were identical to the thousand tentacles!

The tentacles entered the body of the thousand tentacles directly!

The same source of energy was surging into the body!

This sudden situation stunned the thousand tentacles slightly.

“Ahhhhh!”

“Ahhhhh!”

In the next moment, within his body, within his tentacles, the Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts from the evil array faction suddenly let out miserable cries!

The 30-40 Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts within his tentacles were instantly wiped out of their life force!

Instantly, there was dead silence.

The death of the 30-40 Heavenly Yuan creation realm experts caused thousand tentacles’strength to suddenly decrease.

This sudden scene caught him completely off guard!
